# Task

Write a function `wrap_string`. It iterates over words and it will add a new line each time a maximum `text_width::Int=10` would be exceeded. Provide an example



# Data

wrap_string("This function will wrap words into lines")

```julia
function wrap_string(text)
    text_width = 10

    words = string.split(text, " "))
    nwords = length(words)

    for i in 1:nwords
        word = words[i]
        if (i == nwords) || (length(word) > text_width))
            println()
        else
            println(word)
        end
    end
end
```

Example:

```julia
wrap_string("This function will wrap words into lines. It will iterate over words and it will add a new line each time a maximum 10 will be exceeded.")
```
